description: Structured information about properties of an entity that are not represented in an openMINDS schema.
label: Custom property set
name: CustomPropertySet

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte._instruction: Enter the common context for this custom property set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte.label: Context
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte.name: context

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataL._instruction: Add the location of the data that define the custom property set for the given context (e.g., stored as file or other entities such as property-value lists).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataL.label: Data location
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/dataL.name: dataLocation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relev._instruction: Add the technique for which this custom property set is relevant.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relev.description: Reference to what or whom something or someone bears significance.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relev.label: Relevant for
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relev.name: relevantFor
